TopicTitle: All in one science doohickey of deathdoomness

Articles.Content:
New from lolcatface inc! Teh kitteh has landed! And with him he has brought the derp of all derpness! It does science stuff! The new thingy of scienceness has arrived for teh future kitteh to eat or something like dat shtuff. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

It does everything from explosion examination to cat food analyzing! Get yours today or the giant space cat will eat you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
